oai_dc:dc.dc:title: H. Cohen Furniture Company warehouse, Nashville, Tennessee, 1953 February
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: H. Cohen Furniture Warehouse no. 2 in Nashville, Tennessee. The 1954 City Directory cites Percy Cohen, President, Sydney Cohen, Vice-President-Treasurer, with the business address at 207 3rd Avenue N 3. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3 x 4 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: H. Cohen Furniture Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
